CustomField.description: The Date Available is when the Account or Contact may next be used for a reference activity based on the Last Use Date if the reference use limit has been reached (i.e., Limit Reached).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Date Available is when the Account or Contact may next be used for a reference activity based on the Last Use Date if the reference use limit has been reached (i.e., Limit Reached).
CustomField.label: Date Available
